title: Boku wo Sonna Me de Minaide

alternative_titles.en: Don't Look at Me in That Way
alternative_titles.ja: 僕をそんな目で見ないで

synopsis:
Music video for Kikuo's 6th Vocaloid song, Boku wo Sonna Me de Minaide. It tells the story of a child dying in a bicycle accident, saying goodbye to his parents as he recalls what happened in the accident.

(Source: Vocaloid Wiki)
